Arvada.Leyden, Colorado:
Leyden, Colorado is a small unincorporated community lying west of Arvada at the junction of West 82nd Avenue and Quaker Streets. It is a historic company town established by the Leyden Coal Company in 1902 to house the miners of the Leyden Coal Mine nearby to the west.


== History ==
The town of Leyden consists of a collection of square frame homes with pyramidal roofs that were originally red trimmed in white.
